snippet: The F.B.I.'s hunt for leaks among national security agencies has cast a chill over media coverage, Sony reports declining profit in the quarter, and a look at branded headphones used by Olympic competitors.
abstract: The F.B.I.'s hunt for leaks among national security agencies has cast a chill over media coverage, Sony reports declining profit in the quarter, and a look at branded headphones used by Olympic competitors.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Hunting for Leakers, and Olympic Spotlight on Headphones
